comment:
**Variables:**
- \( x \): number of acres of potatoes to grow
- \( y \): number of acres of cucumbers to grow

**Constraints:**
1. \( x \geq 12 \) (Mark must grow at least 12 acres of potatoes)
2. \( y \geq 15 \) (Mark must grow at least 15 acres of cucumbers)
3. \( y \leq 2x \) (Mark can grow at most twice the amount of cucumbers as potatoes)
4. \( x + y \leq 50 \) (Mark has a total of 50 acres of land available)

**Objective Function:**
Maximize: \( 500x + 650y \) (Profit)
